newsitem.title: USA: Wall Street stocks seen higher at start.
newsitem.headline: Wall Street stocks seen higher at start.

text.p: Wall Street stocks are expected to move higher at the open on Friday, but trading will be cautious amid triple witching expirations and caution before next week's Federal Open Markets Committee monetary policy meeting.

"We have all but resolved that the Federal Reserve will hike interest rates," said Larry Wachtel, analyst at Prudential Securities. "At this point, it will be a major surprise if the Fed does not tighten."
